Click here to find out how we handle and collect sensitive information.

 

From: Renata Godinho <support@k2relo.com>
Sent: Thursday, November 13, 2025 6:15 PM
To: Petr Starikov <pstarikov@voerman.com>
Subject: Partner Confirmation / Paul McInnes / K2-120984 / GKN Aerospace / Bristol - Papendrecht / Relocate

 

You don't often get email from support@k2relo.com. Learn why this is important

Dear all, Dear all,

We have received approval to proceed with your service. Please proceed as per your quotation and note all details below:
Please notify K2 if any items have pre-existing damages. Pictures are required.

Please notify us and take pictures of any property damage seen at the beginning of your service delivery.

Please provide the following information one working day prior to the start of your service:

1. Arrival time at residence.
2. Team leader’s name assigned to the service.
3. Team leader’s mobile number.

 

Important:
- Services resulting in additional charges which will exceed your original quotation must be discussed with your K2 consultant prior to going ahead.
- Please await for the green light to be granted before releasing the shipment(s)

Instructions for origin packing / freight agent

GENERAL Packing and freight details

On the working day prior to the service, please advise:

• Time of arrival at residence. Arrival times should be a two hour window.
• Name of crew foreman.
• Crew foreman contact.
• Contact K2 consultant should the crew be running late for the packing.
• Fully Export/ Blanket wrap (as applicable) the shipment.
• Fully protect home including floor and wall protectors as standard.
• Inventory the packed items on site.
• Refer to and complete the Partner Checklist.
• Pack china/ glass/ small electrical items with tissue, shredded paper, paper blanket.
• Use wardrobe cartons where indicated, securing clothes onto bars and then fold remaining clothing neatly into lay flat cartons using tissue between layers.
• Dismantle furniture as required and clearly mark bits in the bits box.
• List bits box as number one on the inventory.
• Provide a list of dismantled furniture to all parties in this email.
• Please see attached high value list- if applicable.
• Please ensure that all wood used in household goods and personal effects shipments is stamped with the official IPPC/ISPM-15 mark. Failure to comply may lead to customs delays, rejection, or return of the shipment.
• All crated/cased/high value items must be photographed before packing and a second photograph taken before the crate is sealed. A full condition report is also required (see crate list attachment).
• Ensure QC form is completed and returned. (if applicable) – Only K2 QC form should be used.
• Ensure Partner Checklist is completed and returned.
• Ensure Plastic Recording Spreadsheet is completed and returned.

A weight certificate (if necessary) should be provided by the freight agent and passed to K2 with the collection documentation. (if applicable)

A bingo sheet is required when loading container. If going via the warehouse, bingo sheet is required when unloading in warehouse, and then, when loading into container.

Delivery details

Delivery agent

rvanwingerden@voerman.com

Instructions for destination delivery / clearance agent

Clearance and Freight Details:

• Confirm the consigning details.
• Confirm if TELEX release is applicable for customs clearance.
• Customs clear shipment(s) and work with K2 to identify suitable delivery dates and organise delivery to residence with full destination unpacking services, removal of debris and reassembly of dismantled furniture.
• Perform access check prior delivery and notify K2 of any potential problems.
• Bingo sheet must be completed on delivery.
• Photos must be taken when container is opened, before unloading.
• Crew to take pictures of the high value items / crated items after unpacking.
• Ensure QC form is completed and returned – Only K2 QC form should be used.

Markings, consigning, and notify details

Road Shipment to the Netherlands

Partner name

Voerman International (Netherlands)

Clearance agent

rvanwingerden@voerman.com

Markings, consignment and notify details

WARNING

Clearance agent to advise ASAP if any corrections need to be made to the above consignment instructions.

 

Country specific instructions

Non-defined country

No country-specific instructions apply for this situation.

Instructions to all parties

Please see attached Partner Checklist that details the K2 process for our partners.

A detailed condition report is to be completed on every inventory indicating any possible scratch, chip dent and its location on the item.

The condition of the property is the responsibility of the mover so please ensure that the crew note any existing marks on the floors, walls, etc. In the event that this is not done and the client makes reference to a damage to their property, the mover will be held responsible for the reparation work.

At K2, as a move management company, our prerogative is for our assignee to work with one global contact; should you therefore need to contact the assignee, please do so via K2.

Bingo cards/ inventories being checked off needs to be completed at any time when the shipment is delivered into the warehouse, loaded out of the warehouse, loaded to container and delivered at residence.

The inventory/bingo must reflect every time a shipment/items is handled. A copy verifying this needs to be forwarded to K2.

Please confirm receipt of this booking, the arrival time of the crew, crew details and contact details.

 

Please forward all relevant inventories, airway bills/bills of lading to the Destination Agent, Mateus Perez & Mateus Perez


Kind regards,
Renata Godinho
renata.godinho@k2corporatemobility.com
